member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.CodePointFilter
member.summary: Represents a filter which allows only certain Unicode code points through.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.CodePointFilter.#ctor
member.summary: Instantiates an empty filter (allows no code points through by default).

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.CodePointFilter.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.ICodePointFilter)
member.summary: Instantiates the filter by cloning the allow list of another .

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.CodePointFilter.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.UnicodeRange[])
member.summary: Instantiates the filter where only the character ranges specified by are allowed by the filter.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.CodePointFilter.AllowChar(System.Char)
member.summary: Allows the character specified by through the filter.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.CodePointFilter.AllowChars(System.Char[])
member.summary: Allows all characters specified by through the filter.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.CodePointFilter.AllowChars(System.String)
member.summary: Allows all characters in the string through the filter.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.CodePointFilter.AllowFilter(Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.ICodePointFilter)
member.summary: Allows all characters specified by through the filter.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.CodePointFilter.AllowRange(Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.UnicodeRange)
member.summary: Allows all characters specified by through the filter.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.CodePointFilter.AllowRanges(Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.UnicodeRange[])
member.summary: Allows all characters specified by through the filter.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.CodePointFilter.Clear
member.summary: Resets this filter by disallowing all characters.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.CodePointFilter.ForbidChar(System.Char)
member.summary: Disallows the character through the filter.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.CodePointFilter.ForbidChars(System.Char[])
member.summary: Disallows all characters specified by through the filter.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.CodePointFilter.ForbidChars(System.String)
member.summary: Disallows all characters in the string through the filter.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.CodePointFilter.ForbidRange(Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.UnicodeRange)
member.summary: Disallows all characters specified by through the filter.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.CodePointFilter.ForbidRanges(Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.UnicodeRange[])
member.summary: Disallows all characters specified by through the filter.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.CodePointFilter.GetAllowedCharsBitmap
member.summary: Retrieves the bitmap of allowed characters from this filter. The returned bitmap is a clone of the original bitmap to avoid unintentional modification.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.CodePointFilter.GetAllowedCodePoints
member.summary: Gets an enumeration of all allowed code points.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.CodePointFilter.IsCharacterAllowed(System.Char)
member.summary: Returns a value stating whether the character is allowed through the filter.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.CodePointFilter.Wrap(Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.ICodePointFilter)
member.summary: Wraps the provided filter as a CodePointFilter, avoiding the clone if possible.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.EncoderExtensions
member.summary: Helpful extension methods for the encoder classes.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.EncoderExtensions.HtmlEncode(Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.IHtmlEncoder,System.String,System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary: HTML-encodes a string and writes the result to the supplied output.
member.remarks: The encoded value is also safe for inclusion inside an HTML attribute as long as the attribute value is surrounded by single or double quotes.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.EncoderExtensions.JavaScriptStringEncode(Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.IJavaScriptStringEncoder,System.String,System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary: JavaScript-escapes a string and writes the result to the supplied output.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.EncoderExtensions.UrlEncode(Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.IUrlEncoder,System.String,System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary: URL-encodes a string and writes the result to the supplied output.
member.remarks: The encoded value is safe for use in the segment, query, or fragment portion of a URI.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.EncoderServiceProviderExtensions
member.summary: Contains extension methods for fetching encoders from an .

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.EncoderServiceProviderExtensions.GetHtmlEncoder(System.IServiceProvider)
member.summary: Retrieves an from an .
member.remarks: This method is guaranteed never to return null. It will return a default encoder instance if does not contain one or is null.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.EncoderServiceProviderExtensions.GetJavaScriptStringEncoder(System.IServiceProvider)
member.summary: Retrieves an from an .
member.remarks: This method is guaranteed never to return null. It will return a default encoder instance if does not contain one or is null.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.EncoderServiceProviderExtensions.GetUrlEncoder(System.IServiceProvider)
member.summary: Retrieves an from an .
member.remarks: This method is guaranteed never to return null. It will return a default encoder instance if does not contain one or is null.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.HexUtil
member.summary: Contains helpers for dealing with byte-hex char conversions.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.HexUtil.IntToChar(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Converts a number 0 - 15 to its associated hex character '0' - 'F'.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.HexUtil.ParseHexCharacter(System.Char)
member.summary: Returns the integral form of this hexadecimal character.
member.returns: 0 - 15 if the character is valid, -1 if the character is invalid.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.HexUtil.WriteHexEncodedByte(System.Byte,System.Char@,System.Char@)
member.summary: Gets the uppercase hex-encoded form of a byte.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.HtmlEncoder
member.summary: A class which can perform HTML encoding given an allow list of characters which can be represented unencoded.
member.remarks: Instances of this type will always encode a certain set of characters (such as < and >), even if the filter provided in the constructor allows such characters. Once constructed, instances of this class are thread-safe for multiple callers.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.HtmlEncoder.#ctor
member.summary: Instantiates an encoder using as its allow list. Any character not in the range will be escaped.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.HtmlEncoder.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.UnicodeRange[])
member.summary: Instantiates an encoder specifying which Unicode character ranges are allowed to pass through the encoder unescaped. Any character not in the set of ranges specified by will be escaped.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.HtmlEncoder.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.ICodePointFilter)
member.summary: Instantiates an encoder using a custom code point filter. Any character not in the set returned by 's method will be escaped.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.HtmlEncoder.Default
member.summary: A default instance of .
member.remarks: This normally corresponds to . However, this property is settable so that a developer can change the default implementation application-wide.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.HtmlEncoder.HtmlEncode(System.Char[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary: Everybody's favorite HtmlEncode routine.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.HtmlEncoder.HtmlEncode(System.String)
member.summary: Everybody's favorite HtmlEncode routine.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.HtmlEncoder.HtmlEncode(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary: Everybody's favorite HtmlEncode routine.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.ICodePointFilter
member.summary: Represents a filter which allows only certain Unicode code points through.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.ICodePointFilter.GetAllowedCodePoints
member.summary: Gets an enumeration of all allowed code points.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.IHtmlEncoder
member.summary: Provides services for HTML-encoding input.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.IHtmlEncoder.HtmlEncode(System.Char[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary: HTML-encodes a character array and writes the result to the supplied output.
member.remarks: The encoded value is also appropriately encoded for inclusion inside an HTML attribute as long as the attribute value is surrounded by single or double quotes.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.IHtmlEncoder.HtmlEncode(System.String)
member.summary: HTML-encodes a given input string.
member.returns: The HTML-encoded value, or null if the input string was null.
member.remarks: The return value is also appropriately encoded for inclusion inside an HTML attribute as long as the attribute value is surrounded by single or double quotes.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.IHtmlEncoder.HtmlEncode(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary: HTML-encodes a given input string and writes the result to the supplied output.
member.remarks: The encoded value is also appropriately encoded for inclusion inside an HTML attribute as long as the attribute value is surrounded by single or double quotes.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.IJavaScriptStringEncoder
member.summary: Provides services for JavaScript-escaping strings.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.IJavaScriptStringEncoder.JavaScriptStringEncode(System.Char[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary: JavaScript-escapes a character array and writes the result to the supplied output.
member.remarks: The encoded value is appropriately encoded for inclusion inside a quoted JSON string.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.IJavaScriptStringEncoder.JavaScriptStringEncode(System.String)
member.summary: JavaScript-escapes a given input string.
member.returns: The JavaScript-escaped value, or null if the input string was null. The encoded value is appropriately encoded for inclusion inside a quoted JSON string.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.IJavaScriptStringEncoder.JavaScriptStringEncode(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary: JavaScript-escapes a given input string and writes the result to the supplied output.
member.remarks: The encoded value is appropriately encoded for inclusion inside a quoted JSON string.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.IUrlEncoder
member.summary: Provides services for URL-escaping strings.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.IUrlEncoder.UrlEncode(System.Char[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary: URL-escapes a character array and writes the result to the supplied output.
member.remarks: The encoded value is appropriately encoded for inclusion in the segment, query, or fragment portion of a URI.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.IUrlEncoder.UrlEncode(System.String)
member.summary: URL-escapes a given input string.
member.returns: The URL-escaped value, or null if the input string was null.
member.remarks: The return value is appropriately encoded for inclusion in the segment, query, or fragment portion of a URI.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.IUrlEncoder.UrlEncode(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary: URL-escapes a string and writes the result to the supplied output.
member.remarks: The encoded value is appropriately encoded for inclusion in the segment, query, or fragment portion of a URI.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.JavaScriptStringEncoder
member.summary: A class which can perform JavaScript string escaping given an allow list of characters which can be represented unescaped.
member.remarks: Instances of this type will always encode a certain set of characters (such as ' and "), even if the filter provided in the constructor allows such characters. Once constructed, instances of this class are thread-safe for multiple callers.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.JavaScriptStringEncoder.#ctor
member.summary: Instantiates an encoder using as its allow list. Any character not in the range will be escaped.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.JavaScriptStringEncoder.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.UnicodeRange[])
member.summary: Instantiates an encoder specifying which Unicode character ranges are allowed to pass through the encoder unescaped. Any character not in the set of ranges specified by will be escaped.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.JavaScriptStringEncoder.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.ICodePointFilter)
member.summary: Instantiates an encoder using a custom code point filter. Any character not in the set returned by 's method will be escaped.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.JavaScriptStringEncoder.Default
member.summary: A default instance of .
member.remarks: This normally corresponds to . However, this property is settable so that a developer can change the default implementation application-wide.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.JavaScriptStringEncoder.JavaScriptStringEncode(System.Char[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary: Everybody's favorite JavaScriptStringEncode routine.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.JavaScriptStringEncoder.JavaScriptStringEncode(System.String)
member.summary: Everybody's favorite JavaScriptStringEncode routine.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.JavaScriptStringEncoder.JavaScriptStringEncode(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary: Everybody's favorite JavaScriptStringEncode routine.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.UnicodeEncoderBase.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.CodePointFilter,System.Int32)
member.summary: Instantiates an encoder using a custom allow list of characters.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.UnicodeEncoderBase.Encode(System.Char[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary: Entry point to the encoder.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.UnicodeEncoderBase.Encode(System.String)
member.summary: Entry point to the encoder.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.UnicodeEncoderBase.Encode(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary: Entry point to the encoder.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.UnicodeEncoderBase.Writer
member.summary: Provides an abstraction over both StringBuilder and TextWriter. Declared as a struct so we can allocate on the stack and pass by reference. Eliminates chatty virtual dispatches on hot paths.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.UnicodeHelpers
member.summary: Contains helpers for dealing with Unicode code points.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.UnicodeHelpers.UNICODE_REPLACEMENT_CHAR
member.summary: Used for invalid Unicode sequences or other unrepresentable values.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.UnicodeHelpers.UNICODE_LAST_CODEPOINT
member.summary: The last code point defined by the Unicode specification.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.UnicodeHelpers.CreateDefinedCharacterBitmap
member.summary: Helper method which creates a bitmap of all characters which are defined per version 8.0 of the Unicode specification.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.UnicodeHelpers.GetDefinedCharacterBitmap
member.summary: Returns a bitmap of all characters which are defined per version 8.0 of the Unicode specification.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.UnicodeHelpers.GetScalarValueFromUtf16(System.Char*,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Given a UTF-16 character stream, reads the next scalar value from the stream. Set 'endOfString' to true if 'pChar' points to the last character in the stream.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.UnicodeHelpers.GetUtf8RepresentationForScalarValue(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Given a Unicode scalar value, returns the UTF-8 representation of the value. The return value's bytes should be popped from the LSB.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.UnicodeHelpers.IsCharacterDefined(System.Char)
member.summary: Returns a value stating whether a character is defined per version 8.0 of the Unicode specification. Certain classes of characters (control chars, private use, surrogates, some whitespace) are considered "undefined" for our purposes.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.UnicodeHelpers.IsSupplementaryCodePoint(System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines whether the given scalar value is in the supplementary plane and thus requires 2 characters to be represented in UTF-16 (as a surrogate pair).

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.UnicodeRange
member.summary: Represents a contiguous range of Unicode code points.
member.remarks: Currently only the Basic Multilingual Plane is supported.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.UnicodeRange.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new .
member.param: The first code point in the range.
The number of code points in the range.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.UnicodeRange.FirstCodePoint
member.summary: The first code point in this range.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.UnicodeRange.RangeSize
member.summary: The number of code points in this range.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.UnicodeRange.FromSpan(System.Char,System.Char)
member.summary: Creates a new from a span of characters.
member.param: The first character in the range.
The last character in the range.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.UnicodeRanges
member.summary: Contains predefined instances which correspond to blocks from the Unicode 8.0 specification.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.UnicodeRanges.None
member.summary: An empty . This range contains no code points.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.UnicodeRanges.All
member.summary: A which contains all characters in the Unicode Basic Multilingual Plane (U+0000..U+FFFF).

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.UnicodeRanges.BasicLatin
member.summary: A corresponding to the 'Basic Latin' Unicode block (U+0000..U+007F).
member.remarks: See http://www.unicode.org/charts/PDF/U0000.pdf for the full set of characters in this block.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.UnicodeRanges.Latin1Supplement
member.summary: A corresponding to the 'Latin-1 Supplement' Unicode block (U+0080..U+00FF).
member.remarks: See http://www.unicode.org/charts/PDF/U0080.pdf for the full set of characters in this block.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.UnicodeRanges.LatinExtendedA
member.summary: A corresponding to the 'Latin Extended-A' Unicode block (U+0100..U+017F).
member.remarks: See http://www.unicode.org/charts/PDF/U0100.pdf for the full set of characters in this block.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.UnicodeRanges.LatinExtendedB
member.summary: A corresponding to the 'Latin Extended-B' Unicode block (U+0180..U+024F).
member.remarks: See http://www.unicode.org/charts/PDF/U0180.pdf for the full set of characters in this block.

member.summary: A corresponding to the 'IPA Extensions' Unicode block (U+0250..U+02AF).
member.remarks: See http://www.unicode.org/charts/PDF/U0250.pdf for the full set of characters in this block.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.UrlEncoder
member.summary: A class which can perform URL string escaping given an allow list of characters which can be represented unescaped.
member.remarks: Instances of this type will always encode a certain set of characters (such as + and ?), even if the filter provided in the constructor allows such characters. Once constructed, instances of this class are thread-safe for multiple callers.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.UrlEncoder.#ctor
member.summary: Instantiates an encoder using as its allow list. Any character not in the range will be escaped.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.UrlEncoder.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.UnicodeRange[])
member.summary: Instantiates an encoder specifying which Unicode character ranges are allowed to pass through the encoder unescaped. Any character not in the set of ranges specified by will be escaped.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.UrlEncoder.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.ICodePointFilter)
member.summary: Instantiates an encoder using a custom code point filter. Any character not in the set returned by 's method will be escaped.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.UrlEncoder.Default
member.summary: A default instance of .
member.remarks: This normally corresponds to . However, this property is settable so that a developer can change the default implementation application-wide.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.UrlEncoder.UrlEncode(System.Char[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary: Everybody's favorite UrlEncode routine.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.UrlEncoder.UrlEncode(System.String)
member.summary: Everybody's favorite UrlEncode routine.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.UrlEncoder.UrlEncode(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary: Everybody's favorite UrlEncode routine.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.WebEncoderOptions
member.summary: Specifies options common to all three encoders (HtmlEncode, JavaScriptStringEncode, UrlEncode).

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.WebEncoderOptions.CodePointFilter
member.summary: Specifies which code points are allowed to be represented unescaped by the encoders.
member.remarks: If this property is null, then the encoders will use their default allow lists.
